title: Random LeaverBuster Ban???
body:
What I know, I have NOT left any games recently... But when I was going to play a game, I had a 20min LeaverBuster! Why did this happen?
Pleas help me!

replies.body: It sounds strange that you would receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) if you haven't recently left games.  Looking into this for you, it looks like the account has had quite a few leaves over the last month.  It's really important to resolve whatever is causing you to leave, as consistently playing without interruptions is the only way to restore your standing.  Let me know if you are having any issues in detail, and I'd be happy to help.  Let me know!

Sometimes my pc just loosing the internet so its not my foult that the match is closing! whe've fixed the internet so it wont happen anymore, we did that a while ago! anything else i can do to prevent this happening?

i really want to play but i dont have mouch time after school so i cannot play! only if i make a new acc and i dont wat to do that again!
And also people have been reporting me for no reason! they're saying stuff like "Report *my name* For feeding!!" after only one death!

is there anything i can do exept creating a new acc?
Don't start a game unless you can finish it, this should be common knowledge. Play a custom unstead. People reporting you for feeding will change nothing, as its not intentional feeding.
Should I create a new acc then?
